name: alt-sendme
description: Send files and folders anywhere in the world without storing in cloud - any size, any format, no accounts, no restrictions. Simple, fast, and reliable.
readme_summary: Alt-Sendme is a free and open-source file transfer tool that allows users to send files and folders of any size and format directly between devices without storing them on cloud servers. It emphasizes privacy and security through end-to-end encryption and peer-to-peer direct transfers, offering a WeTransfer alternative without accounts or personal information.
primary_use_case: Direct peer-to-peer file transfer without cloud storage, emphasizing privacy and security.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled messenger bird, carrying a glowing data packet in its beak, soaring directly from one towering, futuristic skyscraper to another across a vast cityscape. The skyscrapers represent different devices, and the bird symbolizes the direct, peer-to-peer transfer. The data packet emits particles of light, indicating encryption. Small UI elements on the buildings display file transfer progress. The city is bathed in a soft, ethereal glow. The repository name, 'AltSendme,' is subtly displayed on one of the buildings. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: rio
description: A hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator focusing to run in desktops and browsers.
readme_summary: Rio is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator written in Rust, designed to run on desktops (macOS, Linux, Windows) and potentially in web browsers via WebAssembly. It aims to provide a modern terminal experience with performance improvements, leveraging GPU acceleration for rendering.
key_features: Based on Alacritty's code (ANSI parser, events, processor)
primary_use_case: Providing a fast, modern, and cross-platform terminal emulator experience.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting a shimmering, responsive window out of raw data streams, using a high-tech forge powered by a GPU. The artisan shapes the data into a clear, customizable terminal interface. Digital particles flow from the GPU, enhancing the window's performance and visual clarity. Small UI elements displaying code snippets and performance metrics subtly connect the metaphor to software. The scene is set in a futuristic workshop with bright, focused lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and intricate details.

name: tdl
description: ðŸ“¥ A Telegram toolkit written in Golang
readme_summary: tdl is a Telegram toolkit written in Go that functions as a Telegram downloader, but with extended capabilities. It offers features like high-speed downloads, low resource usage, and the ability to download from protected chats, forward messages, upload files, and export data to JSON.
key_features: Forward messages with automatic fallback and message routing
primary_use_case: Downloading files from Telegram, including protected chats, and managing Telegram data through features like message forwarding, file uploading, and data exporting.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a high-speed data stream flowing from a giant Telegram icon into a user's computer represented by a sleek, modern workstation. The data stream is visualized as glowing particles, some bypassing security walls (representing protected chats) with ease. The workstation displays various file formats and data visualizations, showcasing the export functionality. A small upload icon shows data flowing back towards the Telegram icon. The scene is set in a clean, futuristic environment with a focus on speed and efficiency. Small UI elements subtly display download progress and data transfer metrics. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a vibrant color scheme.

name: nightingale
description: Nightingale is to monitoring and alerting what Grafana is to visualization.
readme_summary: Nightingale is an open-source monitoring and alerting system, designed as an alternative to Grafana for alerting. It focuses on processing and distributing alarms, integrating with existing data sources like VictoriaMetrics and ElasticSearch. It uses Categraf for data collection and supports distributed deployment for edge data centers.
key_features: Distributed deployment for edge data centers
primary_use_case: Monitoring and alerting for time-series data, with a focus on flexible alarm distribution and noise reduction.
cover_image_prompt: A seasoned air traffic controller sits at a console, expertly managing incoming alerts represented as glowing aircraft. Each aircraft displays a metric value, and the controller efficiently triages them, routing critical alerts to a team of specialists visualized as illuminated control panels. The console subtly displays Nightingale's logo and UI elements. The scene is set in a futuristic control tower with a panoramic view of a city skyline. Digital particles flow around the aircraft, representing data streams. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: n8n
description: Fair-code workflow automation platform with native AI capabilities. Combine visual building with custom code, self-host or cloud, 400+ integrations.
readme_summary: n8n is a fair-code workflow automation platform that allows technical teams to build powerful automations with a combination of visual building and custom code. It offers 400+ integrations, native AI capabilities, and options for self-hosting or cloud deployment, providing full control over data and deployments.
key_features: Code When You Need It (JavaScript/Python, npm packages)
primary_use_case: Workflow automation for technical teams, combining no-code and code flexibility.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect stands before a complex blueprint, seamlessly connecting various building blocks (representing different applications and services) into a cohesive, automated workflow. The architect uses a special tool that emits glowing lines of code, visually linking the blocks together. Some blocks represent AI models, indicated by subtle holographic brains. Small UI elements float around the scene, showing snippets of code and data flowing between the blocks. The scene is set in a bright, modern design studio with a clean, focused composition. The color scheme is blue and green, with subtle orange accents. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
